hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Saeed Al-khudi said:"The Messenger of Allah: 'There is no worshipper who fasts a day in the cause of Allah, but Allah, the most high, will separate (a distance of) seventy autumns between his face and the fire in return for that day

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى سُفْيَانَ الثَّوْرِيِّ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the differences reported from Sufyan Ath-Thawri
